name: A Gem Like No Other
description:
[Please play the game in Full Screen mode!]

Welcome to the quaint little town of Taernsby, the location of your next heist. Explore the town during the day, then at night, sneak into the lord's manor to steal the gem your companion so desperately wants. A gem valuable enough to ensure you both live comfortably for life, truly... a gem like no other.

[Final Year Games Design Project] [Roughly 11K]
